title: Provide final single-file copy-paste-ready Google Chat Jira incident bot (Option B)
constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not introduce additional backend services or databases; keep logic in the single Apps Script file at frontend/code.gs.
Do not modify frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Adding new bot commands beyond the existing set (hi/help, projects, issues/incidents, create incident, Q&A fallback).
Adding third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported on the IC side, but this request is for Apps Script).
Adding real-time features (WebSockets) or push/email/SMS notifications.
